reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and fair grading. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Excellent teacher who explains complex concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting material, but assignments can be unclear.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject, makes history come alive.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but lectures are often too fast-paced.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking discussions and fair assessments.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Clear explanations, but limited office hours.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Insightful analysis of texts, encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Engaging lecturer who relates course material to real-world issues.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Brilliant mind, but struggles to explain concepts at an undergraduate level.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate about art, makes the subject accessible and interesting.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Solid grasp of the subject, but can be unapproachable.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Inspiring teacher who encourages students to think critically about environmental issues.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Balanced perspective on complex political issues, fosters good debates.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Cutting-edge research discussed, but exams are extremely difficult.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Brings real-world experience to the classroom, practical assignments.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Fascinating lectures, encourages students to challenge their assumptions.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but often seems disinterested in teaching.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Clear explanations of complex topics, helpful during office hours.

reviews.subject: Architecture
reviews.review: Creative projects, but feedback can be overly harsh.
